contenido.en:
Compassion is a deep feeling that moves us to help those who suffer. In the Bible, it is described as an essential quality of Jehovah and His Son, Jesus Christ. For true Christians, compassion is not just an emotion but a way of life.

> ‚ÄúWhen he saw the crowds, he felt deep pity for them.‚Äù ‚Äî Matthew 9:36
